string-array.name: about_credits_names
string-array.item: I want to thank Elxufas for his full cooperation given selflessly to this TEAM, THANK YOU.
I want to thank all users who are using NoNaMe Rom. Without them this project would not be what it is, THANK YOU.

In addition, this would not be possible without the developers of the kitchen, apktools, SuperSU, modders and others, which are so many that I could not name them all and forgot for a few for sure, thanks to all.
And last but not least, my family, who always supports me in my hobby which takes much time. Thanks for your understanding.

string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Added choice between 3Minit Battery / Stock in Status Bar
Add transition effects Desktop TW Launcher
Add Number of visible notifications in Lock Screen
Add Reset Menu Advanced customization options
Added customize clock and date on Status Bar
Added color icons in Status Bar
Added icons position Wifi, Data and Signal Status Bar
Add Custom operator text on the Status Bar Lock and color adjustment
Add data usage settings on Notification Bar
Added operator text on notification bar
And more that will be added.......

string-array.name: clock_font_style_entries
string-array.item: Use System Font (restart UI to set)

resources.string:
"This action needs a restart to apply changes %1$s.
Click OK to restart"
"Backup completed successfully. The backup file can be found at %1$s"
You are sure you want to run %1$s?
The device will restart immediately after finishing the script!!!
Would you like to make a new back up now?

"No root access on the device. Most of the functions of this application can be done without root access. However, you may experience problems with running scripts or reboots. We recommend allowing root access on the next request or permit access manually in SuperSU."
For this action to take effect, you must restart the device. Do you wish to reboot now?

"You have chosen to restore the data of a previous ROM Control
""Please note! This operation will change your device settings based on the settings stored in this file.
"DO NOT PROCEED unless absolutely sure!!!"
Rom Control will close to allow data restoration and reopen again upon its completion. Depending on the amount of your settings this may take some time.
Please click \"CONFIRM\" to proceed or \"CANCEL\" to quit."
This action restores the following items to stock colors
File not found or Root denied
